パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.objects

クラス CellUnderAttack

java.lang.Object
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.objects.Cell
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.objects.CellUnderAttack
public class CellUnderAttack extends Cell
Extension of a Cell when under attack.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • CellUnderAttack

      public CellUnderAttack(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin instance, String flagOwner, org.bukkit.block.Block base, Duration timerPhase)
      Prepares the CellUnderAttack.
      パラメータ:
      instance - A plugin instance. Preferably of Towny or FlagWar.
      flagOwner - Name of the Resident that placed the flag
      base - Block representing the "flag pole" of the block
      timerPhase - Time (as a long) between Material shifting the flag and beacon.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      クラスからコピーされた説明: Cell
      Determine if the supplied Object is the same as the Cell.
      オーバーライド:
      equals クラス内 Cell
      パラメータ:
      obj - the supplied Object.
      戻り値:
      if CellUnderAttack equals a given Object. (Defers to Cell.equals(Object).)

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      オーバーライド:
      hashCode クラス内 Cell
      戻り値:
      the Cell.hashCode() for the CellUnderAttack.

    • loadBeacon

      public void loadBeacon()
      Function to load the war beacon.

    • getFlagBaseBlock

      public org.bukkit.block.Block getFlagBaseBlock()
      戻り値:
      the value of flagBaseBlock.

    • getNameOfFlagOwner

      public String getNameOfFlagOwner()
      戻り値:
      the value of nameOfFlagOwner.

    • hasEnded

      public boolean hasEnded()
      戻り値:
      TRUE if the flagPhaseID is equal or greater than the length of FlagWarConfig.getTimerBlocks()

    • changeFlag

      public void changeFlag()
      Function to increment the flagPhaseID and then run updateFlag().

    • drawFlag

      public void drawFlag()
      Function to draw the war flag, and beacon wire frame (if beaconWireframeBlocks is not empty.) First, runs loadBeacon(). Then, sets the flagBaseBlock to the type defined by FlagWarConfig.getFlagBaseMaterial(). Runs updateFlag(), then proceeds to draw the flagLightBlock. Finally, for each Block in beaconWireframeBlocks, draws it.

    • updateFlag

      public void updateFlag()
      If hasEnded() returns False, update the flagTimerBlock from the timerBlock array, using the flagPhaseID for the array ID. Iterate through and update the beaconFlagBlocks. Finally, log the update on the INFO channel.

    • destroyFlag

      public void destroyFlag()
      Set all blocks constituting the war flag and beacon as AIR.

    • drawHologram

      public void drawHologram()
      Function to draw the hologram. Retrieves hologram settings via FlagWarConfig.getHologramSettings(). Creates a new hologram supplying the plugin instance with FlagWar.getInstance(), and a temporary Location using the flagLightBlock. Disables visibility. Then, iterates through the hologram settings, adding lines corresponding to the line type and data. Finally, adjusts the location of the hologram according to the height of the hologram, and enables its visibility.

    • updateHologram

      public void updateHologram()
      Decreases flagLifeTime by 1, and sets the hologram timerLine text using formatTime(Duration, String) with the updated flagLifeTime and FlagWarConfig.getTimerText() as the parameters.

    • destroyHologram

      public void destroyHologram()
      Deletes the hologram.

    • formatTime

      public String formatTime(Duration duration, String formatString)
      Function used to format a Duration according to the formatting defined in FlagWarConfig.getTimerText().
      パラメータ:
      duration - Duration to extrapolate the hours, minutes, and seconds from.
      formatString - The string to format. Should contain one or more format specifiers with argument indexes corresponding with seconds, minutes, and hours, respectively.
      戻り値:
      The formatted string.

    • beginAttack

      public void beginAttack()
      Draw the initial phase of the flag and jumpstart both the thread and hologramThread.

      Uses the flagPhaseDuration as both the repeat delay and runtime period for the thread. The delay and period are derived from the phase duration in milliseconds, divided by 50. This value is floored to the last tick, and is not rounded.

      If FlagWarConfig.isHologramEnabled() returns true, execute drawHologram(), and if FlagWarConfig.hasTimerLine() returns true, also start a hologramThread, with 20 ticks as both the repeat delay and runtime timer.

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Cancels the thread task, started in beginAttack(). Then runs destroyFlag(). Also cancels the hologramThread task, if running, and destroys the hologram, if it exists, using destroyHologram().

    • getCellString

      public String getCellString()
      戻り値:
      the string "%getWorldName% (%getX%, %getZ%)".

    • isFlagLight

      public boolean isFlagLight(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      パラメータ:
      block - the supplied Block.
      戻り値:
      TRUE if the supplied Block equals the flagLightBlock.

    • isFlagTimer

      public boolean isFlagTimer(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      パラメータ:
      block - the supplied Block.
      戻り値:
      TRUE if the supplied Block equals the flagTimerBlock.

    • isFlagBase

      public boolean isFlagBase(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      パラメータ:
      block - the supplied Block.
      戻り値:
      TRUE if the supplied Block equals the flagBaseBlock.

    • isFlagPart

      public boolean isFlagPart(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Check to see if the supplied Block is part of the war flag's construction.
      パラメータ:
      block - the supplied Block.
      戻り値:
      TRUE if the supplied block matches any of the conditions.

    • isPartOfBeacon

      public boolean isPartOfBeacon(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      パラメータ:
      block - Supplied Block.
      戻り値:
      TRUE if the supplied Block is contained in either the beaconFlagBlocks or beaconWireframeBlocks lists.

    • isImmutableBlock

      public boolean isImmutableBlock(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Checks to see if the supplied Block returns true for any of the following: isPartOfBeacon(Block), isFlagBase(Block), or isFlagLight(Block).
      パラメータ:
      block - the supplied Block.
      戻り値:
      TRUE if any condition is true.
